channel.title: Certain NPC Aggression [508 Zooscape 508]
channel.description:
I'm trying to make my own server right now, but when I autospawn these 3 NPC's: General_Graardor Commander_Zilyana K'ril_tsusaroth They only follow me, they dont attack me. When i try to attack them, it saids "I can't reach that!" Only Kree'arra works.
For some reason, their chambers (in god wars dungeon) are the only places that those 3 npc's atk me and i can atk them back. And when I type ::NPC **** (K'ril_tsusaroth, Commander Zilyana, General_Graardor) in their chambers, they're working perfectly!
Is there a way where when I put them on npcspawn or spawn them using ::NPC in other places, for them to work like they're supposed to?

item.title: Certain NPC Aggression [508 Zooscape 508]
item.dc:creator: @josue992222 josue992222
item.description:
@josue992222 wrote:

the codes are already in there just spawn the npc in npcspawn instead of spawning it randomly.

Read full topic

item.title: Certain NPC Aggression [508 Zooscape 508]
item.dc:creator: @friendscapev3 friendscapev3
item.description:
@friendscapev3 wrote:

u have to go into npc.java and search aggressive

then when u find a list of aggresive npcs add the code of the godwars stuff in it

Read full topic

item.title: Certain NPC Aggression [508 Zooscape 508]
item.dc:creator: @Robo602 Robo602
item.description:
@Robo602 wrote:

I’m trying to make my own server right now, but when I autospawn these 3 NPC’s:
General_Graardor
Commander_Zilyana
K’ril_tsusaroth
They only follow me, they dont attack me. When i try to attack them, it saids “I can’t reach that!”
Only Kree’arra works.

For some reason, their chambers (in god wars dungeon) are the only places that those 3 npc’s atk me and i can atk them back. And when I type ::NPC **** (K’ril_tsusaroth, Commander Zilyana, General_Graardor) in their chambers, they’re working perfectly!

Is there a way where when I put them on npcspawn or spawn them using ::NPC in other places, for them to work like they’re supposed to?

Read full topic
